description: CLI entry point executes and displays help when run with --help flag
steps: Step 1: Run 'node dist/cli/install.js --help' from project root
Step 2: Verify help text is displayed with usage instructions
Step 3: Verify exit code is 0

description: CLI displays version when run with --version flag
steps: Step 1: Run 'node dist/cli/install.js --version' from project root
Step 2: Verify version number is displayed matching package.json
Step 3: Verify exit code is 0

description: Template directory structure is created with all required files
plan_ref: Task 2 - Create Template Files Directory Structure
steps: Step 1: Check templates/prompts/ directory exists with 5 .md files
Step 2: Check templates/agents/ directory exists with 4 .md files
Step 3: Check templates/actions/ directory exists with 4 subdirectories
Step 4: Check templates/workflows/ directory exists with 2 .yml files

description: Standalone workflows have no external repository references
steps: Step 1: Run grep for 'mkrueger12' in templates/workflows/
Step 2: Verify no matches are found
Step 3: Verify all 'uses:' references start with './.github/'
Step 4: Verify no curl commands fetch from external URLs

description: CLI copies templates to target directory when run without --dry-run
steps: Step 1: Create a temporary test directory
Step 2: Run installer CLI pointing to the test directory with --skip-prompts
Step 3: Verify .github/workflows/ directory is created with workflow files
Step 4: Verify .github/claude-parallel/prompts/ contains prompt files
Step 5: Verify .github/actions/ contains action directories

description: CLI respects --dry-run flag and does not write files
steps: Step 1: Create a temporary test directory
Step 2: Run installer CLI with --dry-run --skip-prompts flags
Step 3: Verify output shows what would be created
Step 4: Verify no files were actually written to the directory

description: CLI prompts for feature selection in interactive mode
steps: Step 1: Verify @inquirer/prompts is installed as dependency
Step 2: Verify cli/prompts.ts exports promptForFeatures function
Step 3: Verify function returns FeatureSelection interface type

description: Bundled scripts are created in templates/scripts/ directory
steps: Step 1: Run 'bun run build:scripts' command
Step 2: Verify templates/scripts/planning-agent.js exists
Step 3: Verify templates/scripts/linear-agent.js exists
Step 4: Verify templates/scripts/claude-agent-runner.js exists
Step 5: Verify templates/scripts/package.json exists with dependencies

description: Package.json has correct bin and files configuration for npm publishing
steps: Step 1: Read package.json and verify 'name' is 'install-claude-parallel'
Step 2: Verify 'bin' field points to './dist/cli/install.js'
Step 3: Verify 'files' array includes 'dist/' and 'templates/'
Step 4: Verify required dependencies are listed (@inquirer/prompts, fs-extra, chalk)

description: CLI generates .env.example file with correct environment variables
steps: Step 1: Run installer CLI in test directory with --skip-prompts
Step 2: Verify .env.example file is created
Step 3: Verify file contains GH_PAT variable
Step 4: Verify file contains CLAUDE_CODE_OAUTH_TOKEN or ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
Step 5: Verify file contains documentation comments

description: CLI includes agents when --include-agents flag is provided
plan_ref: Task 2 - Create Template Files Directory Structure
steps: Step 1: Create temporary test directory
Step 2: Run installer with --include-agents --skip-prompts flags
Step 3: Verify .claude/agents/ directory is created
Step 4: Verify all 4 agent files are present (coding-agent.md, etc.)

description: TypeScript compilation succeeds for CLI and all source files
steps: Step 1: Run 'bun run type-check' command
Step 2: Verify no TypeScript errors are reported
Step 3: Run 'bun run build:cli' command
Step 4: Verify dist/cli/install.js is created
